item.title: Welcome!
item.author: Benjamin Maizes
item.description: Hi there! My name is Benjamin Maizes (Ben) and I am excited to welcome you to my new website. My GitHub is: https://github.com/bmaizes My LinkedIn is: https://www.linkedin.com/in/benjamin-maizes/ My contact information can be found in the “contact” section of the website and a blurb about myself is located in the about me section. Thanks for checking this out!
